item.description:
guest speaker in July K. l. Mc Loughlin.
promoting my debut novel Baby Steps (May 2008). Check out my website
www.klmcloughlin.com
for more info on me and the book. I have published
non-traditionally and have learned a lot about the business of publishing,
distribution and marketing and promotions. I would be happy to share
my experiences and/or do a Q&A whatever would serve your members best
along with being able to sell and sign books at the end of the meeting.

group.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals

item.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals Meeting
